name: Astral Plane (matt.psd)
description:
Game created for GMTK Game Jam in 48h!

Astral Plane is a puzzle game about space, time and visual connections

Everything in game (apart from the game engine) was created during the 48h period. Sounds and music by Dictate (his first game audio work!), art and code by me (Matt Iwicki).

If you can't complete a level it's possible to skip it - click the questionmark below the time bar to open the hint window and then choose 'skip lvl'.

Make sure to say hi in the comments!

Also let me know if you stream/record our game, I'd love to see you play!
